Great stay!! Thank you!

Great cozy house!! Bathroom was a plus!

This was one of my favorite Airbnbs. It is just so cozy. I loved how it was decorated, and it was super clean. The hosts are kind and responsive. I would absolutely recommend to friends/family staying in the area.

I stayed at Bee and Paul's BNB for a week, and chose this listing based on A) availability, B) price, C) location, and D) what I needed in a place to stay while working my stretch at the local hospital. Bee and Paul's home provided me with everything I needed, and I appreciated the fact that not only are they very clear about what is expected of me, they provided multiple points of contact so if I ran into any issues, I would be able to get someone.
